name: Merge Number Plus
description:
Merge Number Plus is a new addictive and creative fun number game. It looks easy at first but will be challenging later. You can kill time with it or play with your friends and families.

How to play:
Click on the number to add 1 to it, and Merge Number Plus - eliminate it with the same numbers;
number around it and then plus 1. It’s so that simple and funny;
Match at least 3 same numbers to merge;
You can get bonus by merge more for larger numbers and for more points;
3 kinds of props make games easily;
There is no time limit, so keep playing.


Top Features:
- Merge Number Plus is very Easy to play & very fun;
- Simple but exciting;
- Simple graphic, high performance, and smooth effect
- Auto Save game processing, Involves more deep thinking and strategy instead of fast paced action;
- You can get bonus when you merge more numbers at once;
- Try your best luck to play Fun Lucky Spin every day, collect free coins.
